subject: Re: [junit] using multiple assers in one single test method
msgSnippet: ... Use the assertXyz variant that takes a message string as first argument and put you loop index inside. Robert PS: Please start a new thread if you do nt
messageBody:
On Thursday 11 December 2003 10:42, manas p wrote:
> method for testing one case. But i want a report to be displyed saying
> which comparison method is failed .How many comparisions are done ?

Use the assertXyz variant that takes a message string as first argument
and put you loop index inside.

Robert

PS: Please start a new thread if you do nt reply to another post.
